text:
*Idea: rollback*
Revert your HubSpot instance (or part of it) to a specific snapshot in case some ~*idiot*~ helpful person ~*stupidly*~ helpfully decides to ~*break all of your shit*~ explore interactively

*Idea: default contact view*
• I've made a specific view.
• I customized this view including the columns to be shown
• Can't find a way to set this up as a default for all users which is frustrating as the end user won't set this up or manually click it

*Idea: custom properties in quotes or custom line items*
• We have a weekly payment frequency
• RIP us I guess
• I've made calculated properties which turn that into LTV and monthly 
• This is still charged weekly and we need to present it weekly
• Currently this is a hard blocker preventing us from using line items at all or quotes, which is a huge shame
*:no_entry_sign: Alert: chatspot is broken on eu1 :no_entry_sign:*
